summary: Completed frontend testing for DashboardLayout refactoring. All 3 dashboards (Tipster, Admin, Client) successfully use the shared DashboardLayout component with consistent responsive behavior.
critical_code_review_comments: DashboardLayout component properly implements responsive sidebar with -translate-x-full lg:translate-x-0 pattern
All dashboards correctly pass navItems, activeView, onNavChange, userInfo, onLogout props
Admin dashboard uses brandColor='red' and badgeText='SuperAdmin' correctly
Client dashboard uses brandColor='blue' with emoji icons
Mobile menu button (data-testid='mobile-menu-button') works correctly on all dashboards
Sidebar closes after navigation click on mobile (handleNavClick function)
Overlay click closes sidebar on mobile (handleOverlayClick function)
All nav items have proper data-testid attributes (nav-{id})
context_for_next_testing_agent: DashboardLayout refactoring complete and tested. All 3 dashboards (tipster, admin, client) use the shared component. Key features: responsive sidebar (hidden on mobile <1024px, visible on desktop), hamburger menu on mobile, close button (X) on mobile, sidebar closes on nav click on mobile, overlay click closes sidebar. Brand colors: blue for tipster/client, red for admin. Admin has SuperAdmin badge. All interactive elements have data-testid attributes.

dashboard_layout_component.mobile_sidebar_behavior: hidden by default, opens on hamburger click, closes on nav click/close button/overlay click
